displayProperties.description:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat combatants while using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Defeating high-tier Wrathborn with any weapon or ability will unlock this objective significantly faster.
displayProperties.name: Leviathan's Breath Catalyst

displayProperties.description:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
displayProperties.name: Eriana's Vow Catalyst

displayProperties.description:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

displayProperties.name: Deathbringer Catalyst

displayProperties.name: Monte Carlo Catalyst

displayProperties.description:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
Dealing damage with this weapon reduces your melee cooldown and grants a chance to fully charge your melee ability with each kill.
displayProperties.name: Monte Carlo Method

displayProperties.description: Sustained damage with this weapon envelops the target in a field that weakens and stuns them. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.
displayProperties.name: Judgment

displayProperties.description:
Fires remotely detonated projectiles that drop Void orbs on combatants.
[Shoot]  : Fire; release to detonate.
displayProperties.name: Dark Deliverance

displayProperties.description: This weapon fires shield-piercing ammunition and comes with a scope. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Breaking a matched shield or piercing a Champion's barrier will cause the target to ignite.
displayProperties.name: Looks Can Kill

displayProperties.description: Fires high-powered explosive ammunition.
displayProperties.name: Pyrotoxin Rounds

displayProperties.description: Fires a massive heavy bolt that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.
displayProperties.name: Big-Game Hunter

displayProperties.description: The further a Void orb falls, the more powerful its detonation becomes.
displayProperties.name: Dark Descent

displayProperties.description: When fully drawn, the bolt creates a large concussive blast that knocks combatants back and makes them volatile.
displayProperties.name: Leviathan's Sigh

displayProperties.description: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.
displayProperties.name: Rampage

displayProperties.description: This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon. Melee kills grant ammo for this weapon.
displayProperties.name: Markov Chain

displayProperties.description: Bonus damage when aiming down sights on the opening shot of an attack. This bonus is preserved if the shot deals precision damage or strikes an elemental shield.
displayProperties.name: Death at First Glance

displayProperties.description: Targets under the effects of Judgment long enough are struck with a burst of damage.
displayProperties.name: Penance

displayProperties.description:
Heavy-duty bowstring. Cabal design.
    Slightly increases accuracy
    Increases stability
displayProperties.name: Chain Bowstring

displayProperties.description:
While similar in many respects to other Hive tablets, the runes inscribed on this tablet have a strange shimmer. It has a different weight than other such relics.

An expert in Hive artifacts might know more. Take this to Eris Morn to learn what you can.
displayProperties.name: Strange Hive Tablet

tooltipNotifications.displayString: This quest item can be safely discarded without affecting quest progress.

displayProperties.description:
While similar in many respects to other Hive tablets, the runes inscribed on this tablet have a strange shimmer. It has a different weight than other such relics.

An expert in Hive artifacts might know more. Take this to Eris Morn to learn what you can.
Opens the system core vault in the K1 Revelation Lost Sector.
displayProperties.name: Firewall Data Fragment

displayProperties.description:
Greatly increases the chance of a weapon drop from your next Necropolis or Chamber of Suffering encounter in the Pit of Heresy.

Effect lasts until the dungeon encounter is completed.
displayProperties.name: Hymn of Desecration

displayProperties.description:
Use at the rituals in Sorrow's Harbor on the Moon to skip difficulty phases of Altars of Sorrow.

Can hold only one at a time.
displayProperties.name: Sorrow Accelerant

displayProperties.description: A tasty gift.
displayProperties.name: Small Rice Cake

displayProperties.description: Loc pulse from a Ghost. Present this to Eris to extract its last known location on the Moon.
displayProperties.name: Lost Ghost Trace

3426533770.displaySource: "Their curses are now your charms. Hold such hatreds close, for they reveal their fears." Eris Morn

2690548158.displaySource: "The mind might quail, so your heart must prevail." Eris Morn

2444529479.displaySource: "This relic of ancient trauma is bound by Hive magic, like a new bandage on an old scar." Eris Morn

1925778651.displaySource: "And lastly, a shroud of dreams, so that you might see these nightmares with open eyes." Eris Morn

2465745828.displaySource: "You will go where none have gone before. Tread carefully." Eris Morn

displayProperties.description:

Eliksni Ether reacted with anaerobic fungus to produce this strange plant.

The cost and availability changes daily, so check back often.

A species of diffusuceae prized by the Awoken for its many uses.

The cost and availability change daily, so check back often.

displayProperties.description:
A material normally found on the Moon, and of interest to Eris Morn. Sometimes used to upgrade gear.

The cost and availability change daily, so check back often.

3287201781.displaySource: "The Hive live by sword logic. Teach them another way." Eris Morn

394810086.displaySource: "Broken dreams are all I have left. Why should they be any different?" Eris Morn

1341880512.displaySource: "To the Hive, they are the same. Show them some love." Eris Morn

4169533630.displaySource: "Let their souls sing along." Eris Morn

1220931350.displaySource: "Thousands of Guardians fell to Crota and the Hive. Thousands." Eris Morn

4123554961.displaySource: "You walked through my dream, and in your wake, you left only death." Eris Morn

597679579.displaySource: "Humanity once dreamt of walking on the Moon. Such innocence." Eris Morn

1170891373.displaySource: "They think violence will bring peace. Maybe it can." Eris Morn

4008494330.displaySource: "Even my idle thoughts are haunted." Eris Morn
